did.unittitle: U.S. Department of Justice, Mails and Files Division, General Records Files #23-34-14, Section 1 on Microfilm,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Several letters regarding a case against a group of men in Williamson County, Illinois - accused of posing as Government Officers.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of several letters regarding a case against a group of men in Williamson County, Illinois - accused of posing as Government Officers.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: U.S. Department of Justice, Mails and Files Division, General Records Files #23-34-14, Section 1 on Microfilm #5178 mf. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
